module.name: Music on Hold
module.description: Uploading and management of sound files (wav, mp3) to be used for on-hold music.
module.changelog: *1.5* Fixed upload bug, #1646 could not upload files *1.4.2* List wav files *1.4.1* Add redirect_standard() call to avoid #1616 *1.4* Fix an issue of a new install not having a working MOH until they visit the page. *1.3.2* Add he_IL translation *1.3.1* Changed name to Music on Hold (from On Hold Music) *1.3* Bumped version to assist upgraders from the 2.1 tree. No other changes. *1.2* First release for FreePBX 2.2 - Fixed compatibility issue with new UI
